titles.title: Helicopter Data and Voice Recorder Requirement Act
Helicopter Data and Voice Recorder Requirement Act
Helicopter Data and Voice Recorder Requirement Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to make it unlawful for any air carrier to operate certain helicopters without a flight data recorder and cockpit voice recorder, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Helicopter Data and Voice Recorder Requirement Act
This bill makes it unlawful for an air carrier to operate a single or multiengine, turbine-powered helicopter with one or more passenger seats and one or more pilots without a flight data recorder and cockpit voice recorder.
